txt.en: 'Easterlings are ever the true threat in the Wold, for they cross the river from their hard lands to the east.\n\nThe South Undeep is our most vulnerable point; we have built four watch-towers to keep our eyes along the river. They are ready to fly to Langhold with a call for reinforcements at a moment's notice, but we send a rider to patrol the towers once a week regardless.'
I hear that Easterlings are a great threat.
